content.query:
SELECT TOP (100) [PartyId]
,[PartyName]
,[PartyTypeId]
,[GlobalLocationNumber]
 FROM [Retail_yq1].[dbo].[Party]

 SELECT TOP (100) [CustomerId]
,[CustomerEstablishedDate]
,[CustomerTypeId]
,[ResponsibilityCenterId]
,[LedgerId]
,[LedgerAccountNumber]
,[CustomerNote]
,[PartyId]
,[GlobalLocationNumber]
 FROM [Retail_yq1].[dbo].[Customer]
